content.text: 2 (4 ounce) jars apricot baby food, divided
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "2 (4 ounce) jars apricot baby food, divided" )
( ing-10 "2/3 cup sliced almonds, coarsely chopped" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugars, baking powder and salt.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@20:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the flour"@28:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "sugars"@39:45 / FOOD
			:ref ( ing-1 )
			:ref ( ing-2 )
		)
		:ppt ( ing-3 "baking powder"@47:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "salt"@65:69 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Set aside 1 tablespoon baby food for glaze.
2) In another bowl, beat the egg, milk, oil, extract and remaining baby food.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "beat"@20:24 / AC
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "another bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "the egg"@25:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "milk"@34:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "oil"@40:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "extract"@45:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "remaining baby food"@57:76 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "dry ingredients"@13:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-3-0 "until moistened"@34:49 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Fold in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-10 "almonds"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "apricots"@23:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Pour into a greased 9-in loaf pan.
6) Bake at 350 degrees F (180 degrees C) for 55-65 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Bake"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-6-0 "350 degrees F"@11:24 / TEMPERATURE )
	:heat ( temp-6-1 "180 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "55-65 minutes"@-1:-1 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-6-0 "until a toothpick comes out clean"@-1:-1 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Cool for 10 minutes before removing from the pan to a wire rack.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Cool"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "10 minutes"@12:22 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-7-0 "before removing from the pan to a wire rack"@23:66 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) For glaze, combine the confectioners' sugar, milk, extract and reserved baby food until smooth.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "combine"@14:21 / AC
		:subtask ( purp-8-0 "For glaze"@3:12 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-12 "the confectioners' sugar"@22:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "milk"@48:52 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-14 "extract"@54:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "reserved baby food"@66:84 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-8-0 "until smooth"@85:97 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
